title: I need help with C;/Riot Games\League of Legends|libssL-1_1.dll
body:
Ok so hi im Sam and im having an issue with my League, I was playing like I have done many times before and one day i couldnt open the client and it would load up the symbol then would got any further and then it came up with this message :

Bad Image
C;/Riot Games\League of Legends|libssL-1_1.dll is wither not designed
to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program
again using the original installation media or contact your system
administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status
0xc000012f

so this was a concern at start because i couldn't play league. i have uninstalled the game and tried to reinstall and it opens and it doesnt work it comes up with the message i have windows 8.1 just incase thats important and i have checked my drivers and they are up to date so im stuck for what to do please help !

replies.body:
Hey Sam, thanks for your post!  The issue you're having here might be a combination of a few issues:  Old game files not properly installing the new client, and possible security settings preventing you from doing so.  As a first step, I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and performing a clean reinstall.  

Once complete, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that you can update without issues and allow league as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have the same exact problem but with "libcrypto1_1". This Issue is completely random and has never happened before in all the years I've had this game. The weirdest part is that using your method works but only for one login session; the next time I try to run the game the error reappears. Any suggestion?

I had the same problem but this seemed to help me:
 
"Go to your League of Legends folder
(typically "C: > Riot Games > League of Legends") look for an application called "Leagueclient.exe". Delete it.
Look for "lol.launcher.admin" afterwards and launch it."
This worked for me

Thanks u soooo much bro I love u my problem solved with ur suggestion (Window 10) thank u sooooo much
 <3
THANK YOUUUUU worked for me too (windows 10){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Also worked for me (Window 10)
1000 Thanks (at least)
thank you  so much it  works   for  me  :P

Thank ! i was able to fix my League with the clean reinstall and then i went through my settings as you suggested and it worked fine thank you so much for the help ! well i have had league since S2 so yeah out of date files were probably a big reason XD so yeha thanks

> so this was a concern at start because i couldn&#039;t play league. i have uninstalled the game and tried to reinstall and it opens and it doesnt work it comes up with the message i have windows 8.1 just incase thats important and i have checked my drivers and they are up to date so im stuck for what to do please help me too

If u want it to work go into ur riot games file and go into the lol file next open the RADS file and into projects and then open the League_client file and press on releases and go into the release with the highest number and when u do that search the file for libcrypto-1_1 copy and then go back to the fC:\Riot Games\League of Legends file and paste it there and then press replace file in destination and it should work
TY MAN U FIXED MY LOL <3333

 leagueclient.exe- Bad Image

c:\Riot Games\LOL\ libssl-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation edia or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support.Error status 0xc0000020
